title: need to find font similar to Metro Goldwyn Mayer logo
content:
I need to find a font that look like the one in the MGM logo.  
Anyone has an idea? thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [mgm-logo-large.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150408010045/http:/typophile.com/files/mgm-logo-large.png) | 80.11 KB |
author: denis_dulude

comments.content:
The lowercase a reminds me of Seagull, but otherwise it's not a very good match.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/seagull/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150408010045/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/seagull/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/seagull/")
I think it can be close enough. Thanks so much..
